snippet: New Hampshire's highest court has ruled that four men serving life in prison for murders committed when they were teenagers have the right to new sentencing hearings because of a 2012 U.S. Supreme Court decision....

headline.print_headline: New Hampshire Men Sentenced as Teens to Life in Prison Granted New Hearings
headline.main: New Hampshire Men Sentenced as Teens to Life in Prison Granted New Hearings

lead_paragraph: New Hampshire's highest court has ruled that four men serving life in prison for murders committed when they were teenagers have the right to new sentencing hearings because of a 2012 U.S. Supreme Court decision.
